function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of Covid-19 within construction sites and facilities.","Impact":"Risk of COVID-19 outbreaks, worker illnesses, and project delays.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, testing, and vaccination requirements.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, thermal cameras for temperature screening.","People":"Construction workers, site managers, project stakeholders.","Owner":"Construction companies, site managers, government authorities."}]}
